opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
Mr. Justice Manderino took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Vincent J. Dopko, Deputy Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Ormsby Estate.

July 1, 1974:
